description.value:
The set of codes used to indicate the method used to dispose of the decedents remains.
**Inter-jurisdictional Exchange (IJE) concept mapping**
|VRDR IG Code | VRDR IG Display Name | IJE Code |IJE Display Name | -------- | -------- | -------- | --------| |449931000124108|Entombment|E|Entombment| |449941000124103|Removal from state|R|Removal from state| |449951000124101|Donation|D|Donation| |449961000124104|Cremation|C|Cremation| |449971000124106|Burial|B|Burial| |OTH|Other|O|Other| |UNK|Unknown|U|Unknown|
